name: BOSS HealthCare
description:
BOSS based in Chennai, India, pioneered and specializes in BPO services, apart from providing other services like IT infrastructure support, Software design and Development, Software product development and Network consulting. With our unmatched cost reduction techniques, a consistent resource of talent and skills, and the advantage of being situated in India, BOSS has emerged as a boon to several companies worldwide.
BOSS works with physicians and their staff to help reduce practice cost and accelerate practice growth. We work with you to take care of the practice processes, improving turnaround time and simplifying your insurance process. We work on all specialties for medical clinics with physicians in most states. We use several different medical billing techniques, to meet your needs, for billing and transcription each day. We do the complete insurance follow up. We also have coders on staff to help with any coding needs you may have.
